row.process:
! selon &EF# trouver le code ENTITE SITE
:SET &CLE#=&EF#_&ENTITE_KISS# :SET &ENTITE_SITE#=GET_VAR(VARA.REFERENTIEL.KISS, &CLE#,3) :SET &OUTIL_DNS#=GET_VAR(VARA.REFERENTIEL.DNS, &ENTITE_SITE#) :PRINT DEBUG &ENTITE_SITE# ! :IF &OUTIL_DNS# = " " : PRINT KO: OUTIL_DNS VIDE : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,OUTIL_DNS:VIDE" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="OUTIL_DNS:VIDE" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=10 :ELSE : PRINT OK:OUTIL_DNS &OUTIL_DNS# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,OUTIL_DNS:&OUTIL_DNS#" :ENDIF
!:PUBLISH &EXIT_KISS_OK#,,"TOP" !:PUBLISH &EXIT_KISS_KO#,,"TOP" :PUBLISH &OUTIL_DNS#,,"TOP"
